projectData.title: LeetCodeProblems
projectData.info: Solving leetcode problems when found time!

bio: Hi, I am a Full Stack Software engineer, I like exploring new tech and new ways of solving problems. I like building stuff on weekends where I usually do some self hosting, write bots to help friends get birthday reminders, dockerizing apps, automating stuff, playing with raspberry pi. This is where most of my learning happens. I am currently exploring GO and would like to work on it full time someday.
